name: Zearth
description:
Experience the destruction of earth in a really colorful and cheerful way, while trying to delay the inevitable doom.

Make sure think which asteroids you want to stop.

 Save the cities and the people OR the factories for producing energy that moves the shield and protect the earth. The decision is yours!

---------------------------------------------                                                                                                             Controls

     Gamepad (Recommended)

----------------------------------------------

-Move earth

     + Left Thumb stick

     +Mouse

-Move ISS ( International Space Shield )

     +Right ThumbStick

     +ADWS

-Activate Global Shield

     +Left Trigger

     + Left Shift

-Move Camera to platform

    +Left ThumbStick Button

    + Space Bar

-Zoom

    +Right Mouse Button

     +Right Thumbstick Button

-Exit Game

     + ALT+F4

Have fun!!
